pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DinDongThis is a Python script that allows you to play a DingDong on a Sonos speaker using a local HTTP server. The script uses the soco library to control the Sonos speaker and the click library for command line interface.# How to use it```pip install dingdong-sonosdingdong```You can adjust the volume or set the sonos_ip:```dingdong --sonos_ip <ip-of-your-sonos> --volume 80
